title: Between the Scenes - Kirsten Gillibrand on Taking On Trump in 2020 and Winning the Green Energy Race
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Kirsten Gillibrand on Taking On Trump in 2020 and Winning the Green Energy Race
description:
New York Senator Kirsten Gillibrand answers audience members' questions about why she's running for president in 2020 and how she plans to address climate change.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
